org.wonderly.jnlp
Class DesktopInstaller

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.jnlp.DesktopInstaller

public class DesktopInstaller
extends Object

This class is an installer for installing the appropriate files to make the JiniDesktop be launchable as a JNLP application. This installer utilizes a set of files that are provided in the directory of the JNLP file on the server. These files are

FileInstalled in
jini-ext.jarJRE/lib/ext
jini-core.jarJRE/lib/ext
sun-util.jarJRE/lib/ext
jsk-policy.jarJRE/lib/ext
jsk-resources.jarJRE/lib/ext
desktop.cfg${user.home}
desktop.policy${user.home}

          Construct the installer
